B

bundleId - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The bundle identifier containing the feature

C

com.amitinside.featureflags - package com.amitinside.featureflags
Provides API for managing feature flags instances Bundles wishing to use this package must list the package in the Import-Package header of the bundle's manifest.
com.amitinside.featureflags.dto - package com.amitinside.featureflags.dto
Provides data transfer object for feature instance Bundles wishing to use this package must list the package in the Import-Package header of the bundle's manifest.

D

description - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The description of the feature

F

FEATURE_CAPABILITY_NAME - Static variable in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Capability name for feature Used in Provide-Capability and Require-Capability manifest headers with the osgi.extender namespace.
FeatureDTO - Class in com.amitinside.featureflags.dto
Data Transfer Object for a feature.
FeatureDTO() - Constructor for class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
 
FeatureManager - Interface in com.amitinside.featureflags
The FeatureManager service is the application access point to the feature flags functionality.

G

getFeatures() - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Retrieve all (known) FeatureDTO instances registered in the runtime FeatureDTOs are known if they are configured with OSGi configuration
getFeatures(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Returns all (known) FeatureDTO instances registered with the specified feature ID FeatureDTO instances are known if they are registered with OSGi configuration.

I

id - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The identifier of the feature
isEnabled - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The enablement flag of the feature that denotes whether the feature is enabled or not

M

METATYPE_FEATURE_ID_PREFIX - Static variable in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
The prefix of the feature identifier pattern.

N

name - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The name of the feature

U

updateFeature(String, boolean) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Updates the specified feature.
